article_text: Foster care doesn’t garner media or legislative attention the way it did during the challenging transition to privatization 17 years ago. But it shouldn’t go unnoticed that the number of kids in foster care in Kansas recently reached an alarming all-time high.

article_metadata.title: Eagle editorial: Scrutinize foster care | The Wichita Eagle

article_summary:
But it shouldn’t go unnoticed that the number of kids in foster care in Kansas recently reached an alarming all-time high.
Foster care doesn’t garner media or legislative attention the way it did during the challenging transition to privatization 17 years ago.
